InstallReminder.Message: SpeakingEvals.scpt must be installed for this file to fuction properly and generate reports. Please follow the installation instructions on the MacOS Users sheet and then try again.
InstallReminder.Title: Notice!

CreatingNewSignaturePlaceholder.Message: Cannot locate existing signature shape. A new one will be created.
CreatingNewSignaturePlaceholder.Title: Signature Placeholder Error!

ErrorOpeningPowerPoint.Message: Error opening PowerPoint.{NEWLINE2}PowerPoint may have encountered a bug preventing it from opening and/or closing properly. Please wait a couple seconds and try again. If this error persists, please try rebooting your computer.
ErrorOpeningPowerPoint.Title: Error!

ErrorOpeningTemplate.Message: Error opening template.{NEWLINE2}PowerPoint may have encountered a bug preventing it from opening and/or closing properly. Please wait a couple seconds and try again. If this error persists, please try rebooting your computer.
ErrorOpeningTemplate.Title: Error!

ErrorSavingFile.Message: Export failed. Please ensure all data was entered correctly and try saving to a different folder.
ErrorSavingFile.Title: Process failed!

ErrorZippingFiles.Message: The reports were successfully created, but there was an error when trying to add them into a zip file.
ErrorZippingFiles.Title: Error!

FileNotFound.Message: Selected file does not exist.{NEWLINE2}This is sometimes the result of a file being stored in cloud storage. Please ensure a local (downloaded) copy is present on your computer.
FileNotFound.Title: File Not Found!

FontInstallationFailed.Message: There was an error when trying to install the required font. Please try again, and if the error persists, consider installing the font manually. You can find the link on the Instructions sheet.
FontInstallationFailed.Title: Font Error!

InvalidLevelDetectedDuringImport.Message: An invalid class level ({0}) was detected while importing the data and has been replaced with a blank value.{NEWLINE2}Please select the approriate level on sheet {1}.
InvalidLevelDetectedDuringImport.Title: Import Failed

ImportError.Message: Unable to import data. Please try again or copy the data manually.
ImportError.Title: Import Failed

ImportFromSelf.Message: You cannot import from the current workbook.
ImportFromSelf.Title: Import Error

IncompleteWinnersList.Message: Unable to generate winner certificates due to an incomplete winners list. Please select the winners and try again.
IncompleteWinnersList.Title: Error!

IncompleteRecords.Message: One or more fields for missing. Please complete all fields and try again.
IncompleteRecords.Title: Missing Data!

MissingShapes.Message: There is a error with the template. Please redownload a copy of the original and try again.
MissingShapes.Title: Error!

UnableToCreateResourcesFolder.Message: Unable to locate or create the Resources folder. Please create this manually in the same location as this spreadsheet and try again.
UnableToCreateResourcesFolder.Title: Error!

UnableToDownloadFile.Message: No valid means of downloading required files. Please make sure you are using a supported version of Windows or MacOS and that you have installed the latest updates.
UnableToDownloadFile.Title: Error!

RequestToCloseOpenInstance.Message: An open instance of MS PowerPoint has been detected. Please save any open files before continuing.{NEWLINE2}Click OK to automatically close PowerPoint and continue, or click Cancel to finish and save your work.
RequestToCloseOpenInstance.Title: Notice!

ErrorLoadingViaAppleScript.Message: An error occurred while trying to load Microsoft PowerPoint. This is usually a result of a quirk in MacOS. Try creating the reports again, and it should work fine.{NEWLINE2}If the problem persists, please take a picture of the following error message and ask your team leader to send it to Warren at Bundang.{NEWLINE2}VBA Error {0}: {1}{NEWLINE1}AppleScript Error: {2}
ErrorLoadingViaAppleScript.Title: Error Loading PowerPoint

WarnAboutClosingDelay.Message: There is a uncommon error, where the first time you try to save it fails. If you experience this, wait a couple seconds and try again. It should work fine the second time.{NEWLINE2}Additionally, PowerPoint occasionally takes longer than expected to close. It should only take about a minute for PowerPoint to close, so please be patient.{NEWLINE2}Press okay to continue creating the reports.{NEWLINE1}(This message can be disabled via the Options sheet.)
WarnAboutClosingDelay.Title: Notice!

InvalidReportButton.Message: You have clicked an invalid option for creating the reports.{NEWLINE2}This shouldn't be possible unless this file has been altered in an unintended manner. Please download a new copy of this Excel file, copy over all of the students' records, and try again.
InvalidReportButton.Title: Invalid Selection!

CommentEndsWithInvalidPunctuation.Message: The COMMENT you have entered ends with an invalid punctuation. The '{0}' has been replaced with a period.
CommentEndsWithInvalidPunctuation.Title: Error!

CommentTooLong.Message: The COMMENT for {0} is too long.{NEWLINE2}Please shorten it by {1} or more characters.
CommentTooLong.Title: Error!

CommentTooLongForReport.Message: The comment for {0} is too long.{NEWLINE2}Please shorten it by {1} or more characters.
CommentTooLongForReport.Title: Error!

CommentTooLongUponEntry.Message: The comment you have typed is too long.{NEWLINE2}Please shorten it by at least {0} characters to ensure it fits in the report's comment box.
CommentTooLongUponEntry.Title: Comment: Exceeds Max Length

CommentTooShortUponEntry.Message: The comment you have typed is very short (under 80 characters).{NEWLINE2}Please check that you have followed the "Positive - Negative - Positive" format and provided sufficient detail.
CommentTooShortUponEntry.Title: Comment: Too Short

EnglishNameIsOneLetter.Message: {0}'s English name is only one letter long.{NEWLINE2}Is this correct?
EnglishNameIsOneLetter.Title: Uncommon English Name

EnglishNameIsTwoCapitalLetters.Message: {0}'s English name is just two capital letters.{NEWLINE2}Is this correct?
EnglishNameIsTwoCapitalLetters.Title: Uncommon English Name

EnglishNameIsTwoLetters.Message: {0}'s English name is only two letters long.{NEWLINE2}Is this correct?
EnglishNameIsTwoLetters.Title: Uncommon English Name

EnglishNameExceedsMaxLength.Message: {0}'s English name exceeds the max supported length and has been trimmed to {1}.
EnglishNameExceedsMaxLength.Title: English Name: Exceeds Max Length

EnglishNameTooLongForReport.Message: {0}'s English name is too long and will not correctly fit on the report.{NEWLINE2}Please enter a shorter version of their name.
EnglishNameTooLongForReport.Title: English Name: Exceeds Max Length

ErrorReadingData.Message: Could not read class or student data.
ErrorReadingData.Title: Error!

IncompleteWinnersList.Title: Error!

InvalidPunctuationInName.Title: Error: Invalid Name Detected!

InvalidScoreUponEntry.Message: An invalid score value has been entered.{NEWLINE2}Please enter A+, A, B+, B, C, or a number between 1 and 5.
InvalidScoreUponEntry.Title: Grade: Invalid Score

KoreanNameInvalidLengthUponEntry.Message: You entered an invalid name length.{NEWLINE2}Please verify you have typed it correctly and using Hangeul.
KoreanNameInvalidLengthUponEntry.Title: Korean Name: Invalid Length

KoreanNameInvalidLength.Message: {0}'s Korean name appears to be an invalid length.{NEWLINE2}Please verify you have typed it correctly and using Hangul.
KoreanNameInvalidLength.Title: Korean Name: Invalid Length

KoreanNameUncommonLength.Message: You entered a Korean name with {0} syllables. While these names do exist, they are uncommon.{NEWLINE2}Please verify you have typed it correctly and using Hangul.{NEWLINE1}(Report generation will still work.)
KoreanNameUncommonLength.Title: Korean Name: Uncommon Length

NameTooLong.Title: Error!

ImportTeacherNotesInquiry.Message: Would you like to import your teacher notes as well?
ImportTeacherNotesInquiry.Title: Import Inquiry

LoadedFromTempMac.Message: This file has been loaded from a temporary folder and will not function correctly.{NEWLINE2}Please verify you have correctly extracted this file from the zip file (if applicable) and saved it to a permanent location.
LoadedFromTempMac.Title: Warning!

LoadedFromTempWindows.Message: This file has been loaded from a temporary folder and will not function correctly.{NEWLINE2}The most common reason for receiving this error is that you downloaded a .zip copy of this file and didn't extract 'Speaking Eval Reports (v#.##.#).xlsm' to a different directory. Please close this file and do so before continuing.{NEWLINE2}For further help, please see the '01 - Initial Download and Extraction' instructional video on the dropbox.
LoadedFromTempWindows.Title: Warning!

MissingSheets.Message: One or more essential sheets are missing. Please download a new copy of this file and import any class data from this file.{NEWLINE2}If you receive an error stating that two workbooks with the same name cannot be open at the same time, close & rename THIS file and try opening both files again.
MissingSheets.Title: Critical Error!

RemoveEmptySheets.Message: Would you like to remove any empty class sheets?
RemoveEmptySheets.Title: Remove Empty Sheets?
